additional_instructions:
Output Structure:
1. 'Provision for income tax (net of advance tax)' - from category 'Provision for income tax (net of prepaid taxes)'
2. Show total (which is same as the line item value since there's only one item)
3. Example: Provision for income tax (net of advance tax): 14,91,746; Total: 14,91,746
5. Format all amounts in Indian numbering system without ₹ symbol.
6. This represents the net current tax liability after adjusting advance tax/prepaid taxes.
7. Current tax liability is a credit balance (may appear negative in trial balance) - take absolute value for presentation.
